elements.expression: filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="'Book Antiqua', Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=60 align="center" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "Final, France vs Croatia" | render

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:Final, France vs Croatia AND country:France" fields="goals"
| getCell
| repeatImage size=50 
  image="http://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/redesign/assets/img/icons/ESPN-icon-soccer.png&w=288&h=288&transparent=true"
| render

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:\"Final, France vs Croatia\""
| pointseries color="country" size="ball_possession"
| pie palette={palette "#f7fcb9" "#addd8e" "#31a354" gradient=true} legend=false 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=10 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render

filters | demodata | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=14 align="left" color="#a6dfa2" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# Ball Possession:" | render

filters | demodata | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=14 align="left" color="#a6dfa2" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# Goals by players:" | render

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:Final, France vs Croatia AND country:Croatia" fields="goals"
| getCell
| repeatImage size=50 
  image="http://a.espncdn.com/combiner/i?img=/redesign/assets/img/icons/ESPN-icon-soccer.png&w=288&h=288&transparent=true"
| render

esdocs index="events" q="match_name:\"Final, France vs Croatia\" AND type_of_event:goal"
| pointseries x="player" y="size(type_of_event)" color="type_of_event"
| plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="0" bars="1"} palette={palette "#f7fcb9" "#addd8e" "#31a354" gradient=true} yaxis=true 
  font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="center" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false}
| render css=".canvas__element .flot-text .flot-x-axis .flot-tick-label { transform: rotate(10deg) translate(12px, -26px); }"

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:Final, France vs Croatia AND country:France" fields="yellow_cards"
| getCell
| repeatImage size=50 image="https://images.vexels.com/media/users/3/146861/isolated/preview/dcafb4e33c5514e9b53b3d929501feaf-icono-de-la-tarjeta-amarilla-de-ftbol-by-vexels.png"
| render css=".canvas__element {transform: rotate(50deg)}"

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:Final, France vs Croatia AND country:Croatia" fields="yellow_cards"
| getCell
| repeatImage size=50 image="https://images.vexels.com/media/users/3/146861/isolated/preview/dcafb4e33c5514e9b53b3d929501feaf-icono-de-la-tarjeta-amarilla-de-ftbol-by-vexels.png"
| render css=".canvas__element {transform: rotate(50deg)}"

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# goals over time
### Aggregates all goals from all of the matches
* \\- Look how many goals occur at the end of the game!
* \\- Before the half-time break (45`) there aren't many goals however just after it the players get a boost!" | render

timefilter column="time" from="2018-01-01 02:00:00.000" to="2018-01-01 03:50:00.000" | timelion query=".es(index=events*, timefield=time, q=type_of_event:goal*)" | pointseries x="@timestamp" y="value" color="@timestamp" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="1" bars="5" lines="0" color="#a6dfa2"} legend=false xaxis=true yaxis=true | render containerStyle={containerStyle border=" solid rgba(255,255,255,0)" backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)" opacity="1" padding="1px" borderRadius=".1px"}

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# substitutions over time
### Aggregates all substitutions from all of the matches
* \\- At the half-time break (45`) the coaches preform a lot of substitutions
* \\- The substitutions at the second half approximately normally distributed" | render

timefilter column="time" from="2018-01-01 02:00:00.000" to="2018-01-01 03:50:00.000" | timelion query=".es(index=events*, timefield=time, q=type_of_event:substitution-in)" | pointseries x="@timestamp" y="value" color="@timestamp" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="1" bars="5" lines="0" color="#a6dfa2"} legend=false xaxis=true yaxis=true | render containerStyle={containerStyle border=" solid rgba(255,255,255,0)" backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)" opacity="1" padding="1px" borderRadius=".1px"}
